Minecraft.description:
Minecraft server with selectable version.

Based on a custom docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/itzg/minecraft-server, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

/data.description: Choose a Share for the Minecraft server data, including configuration, mods, etc.
/data.label: Data storage

EULA.description: Must Accept the EULA for Minecraft for the server to run, type TRUE in the box to accept.
EULA.label: EULA Accept
